n = int(input())
num = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = 0
for i in range(n-1):
    for j in range(i+1, n):
        ans += num[i] * num[j]

print(ans)
from sys import stdin

n = int(stdin.readline())
dishes = [int(a) - 1 for a in stdin.readline().split()]
base_points = [int(a) for a in stdin.readline().split()]
additional_points = [int(a) for a in stdin.readline().split()]

# print(n, dishes, base_points, additional_points)

total_points = 0
for i in range(n):
    dish = dishes[i]
    total_points += base_points[dish]
    if i != 0 and dishes[i - 1] == dish - 1:
        total_points += additional_points[dish - 1]

print(total_points)

#!/usr/bin/env python3

n = int(input())
dishes = list(map(int, input().split()))
points = list(map(int, input().split()))
bonus = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = 0
for i in range(n):
    ans += points[dishes[i] - 1]
    if i > 0 and dishes[i] == dishes[i - 1] + 1:
        ans += bonus[dishes[i - 1] - 1]

print(ans)

from sys import stdin

n = int(stdin.readline())
dishes = [int(a) - 1 for a in stdin.readline().split()]
base_points = [int(a) for a in stdin.readline().split()]
additional_points = [int(a) for a in stdin.readline().split()]

total_points = 0
for i in range(n):
    dish = dishes[i] + 1
    total_points += base_points[dish - 1]
    if i != 0 and dishes[i - 1] + 1 == dish - 1:
        total_points += additional_points[dish - 2]

print(total_points)

n = int(stdin.readline())
dishes = [int(a) - 1 for a in stdin.readline().split()]
base_points = [int(a) for a in stdin.readline().split()]
additional_points = [int(a) for a in stdin.readline().split()]

    dish = dishes[i]
    total_points += base_points[dish]
    if i != 0 and dishes[i - 1] == dish - 1:
        total_points += additional_points[dish - 1]
